com.morzeux.bioseclogger.logic

Class ActionMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.morzeux.bioseclogger.logic.ActionMenu

  • public class ActionMenu
extends java.lang.Object
    ActionMenu provides actions to OptionsMenu and sets OptionsManager from SharedPreferences.
    Author:
    Stefan Smihla
